name: Starstorm
description:
Starstorm is a content expansion mod which focuses on bringing new survivors, items, artifacts, skins and much more into Risk of Rain! 

Optional Profile flags:

- ss_disable_enemies: Disables Starstorm's Enemies
- ss_disable_survivors: Disables Starstorm's survivors
- ss_disable_skins: Disables skins
- ss_disable_artifacts: Disables Starstorm's artifacts
- ss_menubind_[key]: Binds the Info Menu to the desired key
- ss_pingbind_[key]: Binds the Ping action to the desired key
- ss_disable_menu_music_remix: Disables Starstorm's main menu music remix
- ss_disable_reskin: Disables Starstorm's visual changes
- ss_disable_bettercrates: Disables crate improvements
- ss_disable_betterpickups: Disables pickup improvements
- ss_classic_exploder: Returns exploders to their pre-1.8.6 appearance
- ss_disable_mp_chest_scaling: Disables added vanilla interactable scaling for multiplayer games


For updates and documentation don't forget to check Starstorm on https://rainfusion.ml !
author: Nk (Neik)
